content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asawocastaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net/asa-woca-adlfs-wsp-cnt/bronze/Family/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


DECLARE @create_view_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
    @folder NVARCHAR(50) = 'Family'

    SET @create_view_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE VIEW beonze.vw_'+ @folder + '
            AS
            SELECT
            *
            FROM
                OPENROWSET(
                    BULK ''https://asawocastaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net/asa-woca-adlfs-wsp-cnt/bronze/' + @folder + '/**'',
                    FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
                ) AS [result]'
    print(@create_view_sql_stmt)



    DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_@{item().TableName} 
    GO 
    CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_@{item().TableName} AS SELECT * FROM 
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK '@{item().TableName}', 
            DATA_SOURCE = '@{pipeline().parameters.datasrc}', 
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET' 
        ) AS [result] 
    GO
